description:
importer: Do not show the "Choose file" button while loading the dialog.

BUG=290769
TEST=1- Launch chrome and open the 'Import bookmarks and settings' overlay
(chrome://settings/importData).
     2- Observe that "Import" button is visible and disabled while the dialog is
loading the profile list.
     3- Observe that "Choose file" is not visible anymore.
R=dubroy@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=224933

messages.text: Hi Patrick, could you review this to me?
